## Description {#details}

TODO: The following <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vectorizationfactor">VectorizationFactor</a> was pulled out of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopvectorizationcostmodel">LoopVectorizationCostModel</a> class.

LV also deals with <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vectorizerparams/#a22854382d27cb43d471731779195e9a8">VectorizerParams::VectorizationFactor</a>. We need to streamline them. Information about vectorization costs.
